channel.title: Help
channel.description:
Hi, on my server the NPC "Squire" Npc ID = 606, teleports you to Green dragons, I want to change where it teleports you to, i have the cords, i just don't know where i would put them, so when a person clicks "yes" it teleports them to Mole
Where would i go to change the Green dragon coords to this [code]toX = 2475; toY = 3046;[/code]
317 Airscape Source:

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“EMINEM BEAST™, post:7, topic:366696”]…K. i found it but it doesnt look anything like that one you showed me, where would i put the coords?

if(NPCID == 606){ NpcDialogue = 116; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

Edit: oh i get what you mean now sorry, and thanks[/quote]You’r welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

…K. i found it but it doesnt look anything like that one you showed me, where would i put the coords?

if(NPCID == 606){ NpcDialogue = 116; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

Edit: oh i get what you mean now sorry, and thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“EMINEM BEAST™, post:5, topic:366696”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=462898.msg3386136#msg3386136 date=1288470652]

// all of this belongs to client.java if (NPCID == 606) { // search this condition toX = 2475; // change the x coord to 2475 toY = 3046; // change the y coord to 3046 } // end the condition
[/quote]
what would i search for in client.java to find that?[/quote]Learn to read the code and conventions.

Read full topic
